about_the_game:
Space Book

This Space themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Inspired by space, rockets, astronomy, and other planetary bodies.

Contents

The Space book unlocks the following images:
  • Rocket - 13x23
  • Soyuz - 21x286
  • Alien - 26x22
  • Shuttle - 41x100
  • Vomit Comet - 47x19
  • Comet - 54x55
  • Space Ship - 72x35
  • Boot Prints - 80x80
  • Planet - 95x92
  • Hubble - 121x96
  • First Men - 142x142
  • Pluto - 150x150
  • Carina Nebula - 170x170
  • Searching - 200x60
  • ISS - 200x200
  • Mars - 200x200
  • Sol - 200x200
  • Distant Moon - 210x150
  • Voyager - 301x325
  • Colony - 320x180

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: Coloring Pixels - Space Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 7700k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

short_description: Unlocks the Space themed book for Coloring Pixels. Includes 20 new space themed levels to complete! Expect images of planets, rockets, and nebulae.
